title: How to learn vocabulary while reading a book - Quora

response.answer_text: Have a dictionary app in your phone. This will keep track of the words you have looked for. Now to appetize your vocabulary everyday go through the words you have searched day before, in morning before starting your day. Then try to use those words in your daily activity . The more you will use the more you will learn. People learn more effectively when they write something so you can also start by writing few sentences using those words

So what you can do is keep noting down difficult words on a piece of paper or as a note on your phone and look them up in the dictionary when you are done reading a few pages. Over time, you'll start guessing meanings of words that seem difficult and won't need to refer to a dictionary every time you come across a new word. You can also learn basics like neo means new, biblio is books, etc. It'll make it easier to guess meanings of words. Hope it helps!

There are some books which give mnemonics shortcuts to learn vocab which is a quite useful and smart way to learn vocab. Rest for me vocab books are boring as hell. Use pocket cards to learn and keep on updating it also set a target to learn 20 - 30 or more words per day to learn. Revise on daily, weekly and monthly basis. I think you are as interested as I am in reading books. I have a goal of reading a book a month but that’s still slow so I am using this site to grab quick summaries of quality books. Just see if it helps you. Hope it helps !!
Underline new and interesting words, search meanings, synonyms and connotations and then use in regular day to day conversations or start writing something using those words.

Keep a dictionary with you while reading. Mark the words that are new to you and look them up. It will take up some time but will help you understand what you read better. You can maintain a diary with all the new words as well that will help you with vocabulary.

Have a running list of words you do not know or do not use regularly.Find out the meaning of 4 to 5 words using a dictionary. Try to construct sentences using those words. If possible try to use those words in a conversationMove on to the next 5 words.

Reading is considered to be one of the best things to enhance our knowledge and vocabulary. While reading a book you make sure to write down the new vocabulary which you find and later on find it's meaning and make sure to make new sentences and revise it quite often. In this way, you will retain it for long
